meanings.definition: A document detailing the contents of a shipment and used for tracking purposes.
meanings.sent1: The waybills showed all the items in the delivery.
meanings.sent2: Please make sure to include the waybills with the package.
meanings.sent3: The waybills decided to take a vacation from tracking shipments.
meanings.sent4: The waybills were like detectives, revealing the secrets of each package.
meanings.sent5: The waybills were the guardians of the shipment's information.

meanings.definition: To document the contents of a shipment for tracking purposes.
meanings.sent1: She carefully waybills each item before sending it out.
meanings.sent2: Remember to waybills the boxes before they leave the warehouse.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to waybills its toys but got distracted by a shiny object.
meanings.sent4: He waybills the packages with precision, ensuring no mistakes are made.
meanings.sent5: Waybilling the goods felt like painting a picture of the shipment's journey.
